title: Moka 1.01
description:
A convenient, fluid experience for reading and sharing news and other RSS feeds allowing you to be updated, wherever you go. Moka is a intuitive and minimal RSS gatherer for Google Reader. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s design keeps it out of the way, updated for when you are ready to read. Moka also has functions for sharing stories and posts which allows for a more in-depth reading experience. It links with your Google Reader account and allows you to change the refresh time from 5 minutes to 30 minutes. It also has additional functions to filter your feeds and even change the account.

Features
-Rapid RSS news gatherer
-Quick Preview
-Minimal, Fresh design
-Mark all as read
-Account switching
-Full Lion support
-Search function

Moka requires Google Reader account.
